trans-unit.source: Specifies error conditions that can occur when performing a rights management operation.
trans-unit.target: 具體說明執行權限管理作業時可能發生的錯誤情況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException.FailureCode%2A> and <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> properties to create an error message for the user.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException.FailureCode%2A>和<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性來建立使用者的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operation canceled, or a non-recoverable error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業已取消，或發生無法復原的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: License activation failed; rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 授權啟用失敗；未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The current user was not found in the Active Directory (AD) for certification under Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在 Active Directory (AD) 中找不到 Windows 驗證下進行認證的目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 要求的作業已在進行中。

trans-unit.source: Possible authentication error (HTTP error 401) returned by an Internet request.
trans-unit.target: 網際網路要求傳回可能的驗證錯誤 (HTTP 錯誤 401)。

trans-unit.source: Or, the current user does not have valid domain credentials in a silent user activation attempt.
trans-unit.target: 或者，在無訊息的使用者啟用嘗試中，目前的使用者不具有有效的網域認證。

trans-unit.source: Or, the certification server in silent user activation is not in the local intranet or trusted sites zone.
trans-unit.target: 或者，無訊息的使用者啟用中的憑證伺服器不在近端內部網路或信任的網站區域。

trans-unit.source: An invalid constant was passed.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞了無效的常數。

trans-unit.source: The access condition is not matched to the enabling principal that is handed into the bind.
trans-unit.target: 存取條件不符合交給繫結的啟用主體。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not satisfy the conditions defined in the End Use License (EUL).
trans-unit.target: 目前的使用者不符合使用授權 (EUL) 中定義的條件。

trans-unit.source: The specified resource is not contained in any WORK node of the license.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資源未包含在授權的任何 WORK 節點中。

trans-unit.source: The enabling principal does not match the issued principal of the End Use License (EUL).
trans-unit.target: 啟用主體不符合使用授權 (EUL) 的發行主體。

trans-unit.source: The defined time period for the protected content has expired; access is no longer permitted.
trans-unit.target: 為受保護內容定義的時間週期已過期；不再允許存取。

trans-unit.source: The current machine is not defined within the rights managed group identity.
trans-unit.target: 目前的電腦未定義於版權管理的群組識別身分內。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The specified rights group is not contained in the End Use License (EUL).
trans-unit.target: 指定的權限群組未包含在使用授權 (EUL) 中。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The license requires that a new revocation list must be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 授權要求必須取得新的撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The End Use License (EUL) contains no WORK node.
trans-unit.target: 使用授權 (EUL) 未包含 WORK 節點。

trans-unit.source: The defined time period for the protected content has expired; access is no longer permitted.
trans-unit.target: 為受保護內容定義的時間週期已過期；不再允許存取。

trans-unit.source: The rights management certificate chain is broken.
trans-unit.target: 版權管理憑證鏈結已中斷。

trans-unit.source: Clock rollback has been detected.
trans-unit.target: 發現時鐘復原。

trans-unit.source: Protected content cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 無法存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation that was requested is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援要求的密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: For example, passing an RMS encrypting object for decrypting purposes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，傳遞 RMS 加密物件以進行解密。

trans-unit.source: Cannot open or publish content with restricted permissions because a debugger has been detected.
trans-unit.target: 無法以限制權限開啟或發行內容，因為偵測到偵錯工具。

trans-unit.source: The user's email address cannot be verified.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證使用者的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The specified principal cannot be enabled
trans-unit.target: 無法啟用指定的主體

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允許加密。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> cannot load.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> cannot load.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />。

trans-unit.source: The authorized time period defined in the issuance license template has expired; access is no longer permitted.
trans-unit.target: 發佈授權範本中定義的授權時間週期已過期；不再允許存取。

trans-unit.source: The option specified has already been set.
trans-unit.target: 已設定指定的選項。

trans-unit.source: A user name was not specified for the client session
trans-unit.target: 未指定用戶端工作階段的使用者名稱

trans-unit.source: The Hardware ID (HID) used in a machine activation attempt is incorrectly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 機器啟用嘗試中使用的硬體識別碼 (HID) 格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The Hardware ID (HID) used in a machine activation attempt is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 機器啟用嘗試中使用的硬體識別碼 (HID) 無效。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The content ID from the license does not match the content ID the license storage session
trans-unit.target: 授權中的內容識別碼不符合授權儲存工作階段的內容識別碼

trans-unit.source: An object type passed is incompatible with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的物件型別與這項作業不相容。

trans-unit.source: When creating a bound license, an issuance license, not an end-use license, was specified.
trans-unit.target: 建立繫結授權時指定的是發佈授權，而非使用者授權。

trans-unit.source: Some information is missing.
trans-unit.target: 遺漏某些資訊。

trans-unit.source: An installation operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 安裝作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm type specified is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的演算法無效。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: RMS Server email address verification failed.
trans-unit.target: RMS 伺服器電子郵件地址驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: The specified encoding type is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的編碼類型無效。

trans-unit.source: Either the environment or the enabling principal handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 環境或啟用主體控制代碼無效。

trans-unit.source: The Rights Management Services template contains one or more errors.
trans-unit.target: 權限管理服務範本包含一或多個錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The key length specified in a key/value pair is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵/值組中指定的金鑰長度無效。

trans-unit.source: The license structure in one of the certificates is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個憑證中的授權結構無效。

trans-unit.source: Rights management signed digital certificate cannot be validated.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證權限管理簽署的數位憑證。

trans-unit.source: (The signed certificate may have been tampered.)
trans-unit.target: (簽署的憑證可能已遭竄改)。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value specified is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的數值無效。

trans-unit.source: The specified registry path is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的登錄路徑不正確。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The time information specified is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間資訊無效。

trans-unit.source: The rights management version is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 權限管理版本不正確。

trans-unit.source: The key type specified in a key/value pair is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援索引鍵/值組中指定的金鑰類型。

trans-unit.source: A library operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 程式庫作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: The specified library plug-in is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援指定的媒體櫃外掛程式。

trans-unit.source: An End Use License (EUL) could not be acquired from the rights management server.
trans-unit.target: 無法從權限管理伺服器取得使用授權 (EUL)。

trans-unit.source: The current user credentials are not valid for acquiring a license.
trans-unit.target: 目前的使用者認證無法順利取得授權。

trans-unit.source: An operation is in violation of the rights management manifest policy.
trans-unit.target: 作業違反權限管理資訊清單原則。

trans-unit.source: The specified metadata could net be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定指定的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The user is not activated, or no Rights Account Certificate (RAC) was submitted and none was found in the license store to match the license associated with this session.
trans-unit.target: 使用者未啟用，或未提交權限帳戶憑證 (RAC)，而且在授權存放區中找不到與此工作階段關聯的授權相符的授權。

trans-unit.source: The computer must be activated before the user can be activated.
trans-unit.target: 必須先啟用電腦，才能啟用使用者。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management cannot connect to the URI specified for the license server.
trans-unit.target: 版權管理無法連線至為授權伺服器指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The protected content is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 受保護的內容已損毀。

trans-unit.source: A required license is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用必要的授權。

trans-unit.source: No license or certificate exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 沒有授權或憑證存在指定的索引中。

trans-unit.source: Rights managed content is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 版權管理的內容已損毀。

trans-unit.source: The item requested to delete does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 要求刪除的項目不存在。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: The license server's maximum quota of End Use Licenses (EULs) has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 已達到使用授權 (EUL) 的授權伺服器配額上限。

trans-unit.source: The document does not contain an Owner License.
trans-unit.target: 文件未包含擁有者授權。

trans-unit.source: No instances of the requested attribute exist.
trans-unit.target: 所要求屬性的執行個體不存在。

trans-unit.source: The specified license was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的授權。

trans-unit.source: The Rights Management server does not allow temporary certification of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 版權管理伺服器不允許目前使用者的暫時憑證。

trans-unit.source: Certificate or license revocation information has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 尚未設定憑證或授權撤銷資訊。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to access the protected content.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者沒有權限可存取受保護的內容。

trans-unit.source: The requested right was not specified when the content was published with rights management.
trans-unit.target: 以權限管理發行內容時未指定要求的權限。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Rights management services are not properly configured.
trans-unit.target: 未正確設定權限管理服務。

trans-unit.source: Operation has competed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 作業已順利完成。

trans-unit.source: The number of certificates has exceeded the maximum number allowed.
trans-unit.target: 憑證數量已超過允許的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: Too many <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> instance have been created.
trans-unit.target: 建立太多 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生未指定的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Also thrown when an application runs in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 也會在應用程式於偵錯模式執行時擲回。

trans-unit.source: If a request is made for computer activation or a rights account certificate, receiving <see cref="F:System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode.UseDefault" /> indicates that the application should pass <see langword="null" /> into the ActServInfo parameter
trans-unit.target: 如果是要求啟用電腦或權限帳戶憑證，則收到 <see cref="F:System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode.UseDefault" /> 表示應用程式應將 <see langword="null" /> 傳遞到 ActServInfo 參數

trans-unit.source: The defined time period for the protected content has expired; access is no longer permitted.
trans-unit.target: 為受保護內容定義的時間週期已過期；不再允許存取。
